hero.title: Precision in Cadastral & Surveying

servicesOverview.title: Our Services
servicesOverview.subtitle: Complete solutions for all your cadastral and surveying needs

cadastral.title: Cadastre & Land Registration
cadastral.description: Complete cadastral documentation for Land Book registration, property divisions, consolidations, and data updates.

topography.title: Topographical Surveys
topography.description: Precision measurements with state-of-the-art equipment for site plans and construction projects.

gis.title: GIS Systems
gis.description: Implementation and development of geographic information systems for public administration and private companies.

urbanPlanning.title: Urban Planning (PUG/PUZ/PUD)
urbanPlanning.description: Urban planning and territorial development documentation in accordance with current legislation.

precision.title: Maximum Precision
precision.description: We use cutting-edge surveying equipment and professional software for the highest quality results.

compliance.title: Legal Compliance
compliance.description: All documentation is prepared in accordance with current legislation and ANCPI requirements.

efficiency.title: Efficiency & Speed
efficiency.description: Optimized processes for timely delivery of documentation without compromising on quality.

expertise.title: Proven Expertise
expertise.description: Team of authorized specialists with extensive experience in diverse projects from public and private sectors.
